price: Kuma waɗanda suke cẽwa "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka karkatar da azãbar Jahannama daga gare mu. Lalle ne, azãbarta tã zama tãra*
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
footnotes: * Garama, ita ce uƙũba da dũkiya mai lazimtar wanda aka aza wa ita. Da Hausa anã cewa tãra. Watau azãba da zã tafi ƙarfin jiki har tanã neman wani abu wanda ya danganci jiki. Kõ mene ne, kamar dũkiya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā iṣ'rif ʿannā ʿadhāba jahannama inna ʿadhābahā kāna gharāman
